common.an_error_occurred: An error occurred. Please try again later.

disclaimer.title: Important Disclaimer
disclaimer.text: The AI Lung Cancer Review System provides preliminary information only and is NOT a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. The information presented here is generated by an AI and MUST be reviewed and confirmed by a qualified physician. Do not make any health-related decisions based solely on this information. Please consult with your healthcare provider for any medical concerns.

upload.title: Upload Medical Documents
upload.instructions: Please upload your medical documents related to your lung health. This may include:
upload.pathology: Pathology Reports - PDF, JPEG, PNG format
upload.radiology: Radiology Reports - PDF, JPEG, PNG format
upload.lab: Lab Results - CSV format (or enter manually below)
upload.dragOrClick: Drag and drop files here or click to browse
upload.allowedTypes: Allowed file types: DICOM, PDF, JPEG, PNG, CSV
upload.disclaimer: I understand that the information provided by this application is preliminary and <0>must</0> be reviewed and confirmed by a qualified physician. I will not make any health-related decisions based solely on this information.
upload.file_too_large: File is too large. Maximum size is 50MB.
upload.file_invalid_type: File has an invalid file type.

report_issue_form.title: Laporkan Masalah Sistem
report_issue_form.description: Silakan jelaskan masalah yang Anda alami. Jangan sertakan PII apa pun.
report_issue_form.report_submitted_success: Terima kasih telah mengirimkan laporan masalah. Kami akan meninjau laporan Anda dan mengatasi masalah tersebut sesegera mungkin.
report_issue_form.report_submitted_error: Kesalahan mengirimkan laporan masalah. Silakan coba lagi nanti.
